info.title: College API
info.description: An API to search for colleges based on various parameters like type, state, city, and name.

get.summary: Get Colleges by type and state

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of college (e.g., engineering, medical)

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to filter colleges by

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city to filter colleges by (optional)

200.description: List of colleges in the specified state and type

get.summary: Get Colleges by type and city

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of college (e.g., engineering, medical)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city to filter colleges by

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to filter colleges by (optional)

200.description: List of colleges in the specified city and type

get.summary: Get Government Colleges by type and state

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of government college (e.g., engineering, medical)

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to filter colleges by

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city to filter colleges by (optional)

200.description: List of Government colleges in the specified state and type

get.summary: Get Government Colleges by type and city

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of government college (e.g., engineering, medical)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city to filter colleges by

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to filter colleges by (optional)

200.description: List of Government colleges in the specified city and type

post.summary: Search colleges by name, type, and optionally state/city

schema.description: The name or part of the name of the college

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to filter colleges by (optional)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city to filter colleges by (optional)

400.description: Bad request if parameters are missing

404.description: No colleges found matching the parameters

post.summary: Search government colleges by name, type, and optionally state/city

schema.description: The name or part of the name of the government college

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to filter colleges by (optional)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city to filter colleges by (optional)

400.description: Bad request if parameters are missing

404.description: No government colleges found matching the parameters

state.description: The state where the college is located

city.description: The city where the college is located

type.description: The type of college (e.g., engineering, medical)
